alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 08 at 2:01PM MST until November 09 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to two inches except local amounts up to four inches. * WHERE...In Idaho, Lower Treasure Valley ID and Upper Treasure Valley zones. In Oregon, Oregon Lower Treasure Valley zone. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect rain changing to snow early Wednesday morning in the Boise metro area.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Treasure Valley
